item.title: Unveil Data Security Paradoxes | Uncovering Hidden Risks Podcast
item.description: There are many industry reports that focus on the cost of data incidents, but have you ever wondered about the best practices to manage security? Microsoft has recently released a new report called the Data Security Index. We partnered with the independent research agency Hypothesis Group to conduct a multinational survey involving more than 800 data security professionals. In this episode of the Uncovering Hidden Risks podcast, host Erica Toelle talks to Herain Oberoi, the General Manager of Data Security, Privacy, and Compliance at Microsoft, about the findings in this research.
